step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your fists closed and muscles tight as you bring your arms in front of your chest.
Nicely done opening your hands and extending your arms. Remember to exhale as you relax your muscles.
Excellent! Continue to open your fingers wide and extend your arms horizontally to shoulder height.
Great job on the movement. Focus on maintaining shoulder height and a controlled exhale.
You're doing well with the horizontal pumping motion. Keep up the good work!
Second rep, looking good! Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles as you bring your arms in.
Keep up the great work on opening your hands and extending. Exhale and relax.
Excellent form on this step. Continue opening your fingers and extending your arms to shoulder height.
Good control on the movement. Remember to exhale fully and relax your muscles as you extend.
Fantastic finish to the second set! You're effectively promoting lymph drainage with this exercise.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fists closed and muscles tight on the inhale as you bring your arms in, then open your hands and relax on the exhale as you extend. Maintain shoulder height throughout.
